name: Market Quarter (Harborward)
role_in_state: primary coastal trade and pilotage hub
culture_adjustments: market-first civic identity over boat-name primacy
kin-track ties softened by transient crews and merchants
oral sea-songs adapted into vendor call/negotiation forms
artisan-runic shopmarks more common than household marks
calendar organized around tide-markets and cargo seasons
constraints: ritual auguries consume scarce imported reagents
limited combustion industry; no high-pressure steam docks
notes: market hours tied to high tide windows
